KYLIE Jenner and her two-year-old daughter Stormi have made their magazine cover debut together for Vogue Czechoslovakia’s latest issue. BODYCAM BOMBSHELL

Mentally ill black man jailed for 5 months after cops mocked and beat him

KENTA Settles, 28, was punched, kicked, Tasered and ridiculed by white officers who stopped him without giving a reason as he walked down a street in Cleveland, Ohio in January. He spent almost five months in jail accused of resisting arrest and assaulting police until bodycam footage prompted prosecutors to drop the charges.

GRIPE SESSIONS

Trump to campaign AGAINST his own ex-AG Sessions in Senate primary runoff

PRESIDENT Donald Trump will be stopping in Alabama during his post-virus campaign restart, giving him a chance to face - and campaign against - his former attorney general, Jeff Sessions, who is running for his old senate seat. Not only will the rally take place in Sessions' hometown, it will be in the same stadium at which Sessions joined Trump on stage in 2015, becoming his first high-profile backer.

RIP LUCE

Teenage climbing champion, 16, killed falling 500ft from cliffs in the French Alps

CLIMIBING prodigy Luce Douady was tipped as a contender at the Olympics in Tokyo next year. The 16-year-old world junior champion died while exploring cliffs near her home in the South of France, her sporting body said.
